action.action-desc: Mrs. Lesko (for herself, Mr. Schneider, and Mr. Case) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require estimated income tax installments to be paid on a quarterly basis.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Tax Deadline Simplification Act.

section.header: Quarterly installments for estimated income tax payments by individual

subsection.text: The table contained in paragraph (2) of section 6654(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking June 15 and inserting July 15, and
by striking September 15 and inserting October 15.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to installments due in taxable years beginning after the date of the enactment of this Act.
